word: THE WORD OF GOD AND THE COUNSELS OF ELLEN WHITE LEAD US TO THE CONCLUSION THAT WE ARE JUSTIFIED BY FAITH AND ACCEPTING CHRIST, BUT WE ARE SANCTIFIED BY FAITH AND OBEDIENCE. THE TRULY BORN-AGAIN CHRISTIAN NOT ONLY TALKS ABOUT, BUT LIVES A LIFE THAT TESTIFIES THAT HE IS, IN FACT, A FOLLOWER OF THE LORD JESUS CHRIST.
